20101204024301.000|20101204024302.429|CCO|  [ Male Announcer ] If you've
20101204024302.429|20101204024303.857|CCO|  had a heart attack caused by
20101204024303.857|20101204024305.286|CCO|  a completely blocked artery,
20101204024305.286|20101204024306.714|CCO| another heart attack could be
20101204024306.714|20101204024308.143|CCO|  lurking, waiting to strike.
20101204024308.143|20101204024309.571|CCO|         A heart attack
20101204024309.571|20101204024311.000|CCO|    that's caused by a clot,
20101204024311.000|20101204024312.250|CCO|    one that could be fatal.
20101204024312.250|20101204024313.500|CCO|  But PLAVIX helps save lives.
20101204024313.500|20101204024314.750|CCO|       PLAVIX, taken with
20101204024314.750|20101204024316.000|CCO|     other heart medicines,
20101204024316.000|20101204024317.250|CCO|     goes beyond what other
20101204024317.250|20101204024318.500|CCO|   heart medicines do alone,
20101204024318.500|20101204024319.750|CCO| to provide greater protection
20101204024319.750|20101204024321.000|CCO|      against heart attack
20101204024321.000|20101204024322.111|CCO|    or stroke and even death
20101204024322.111|20101204024323.222|CCO|           by helping
20101204024323.222|20101204024324.333|CCO|    to keep blood platelets
20101204024324.333|20101204024325.444|CCO|     from sticking together
20101204024325.444|20101204024326.556|CCO|  and forming dangerous clots.
20101204024326.556|20101204024327.667|CCO|        Ask your doctor
20101204024327.667|20101204024328.778|CCO|  if PLAVIX is right for you.
20101204024328.778|20101204024329.889|CCO|     Protection that helps
20101204024329.889|20101204024331.000|CCO|          save lives.
20101204024331.000|20101204024332.111|CCO|      [ Female Announcer ]
20101204024332.111|20101204024333.222|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101204024333.222|20101204024334.333|CCO|      and some medicines,
20101204024334.333|20101204024335.444|CCO|       such as Prilosec,
20101204024335.444|20101204024336.556|CCO|  reduce the effect of PLAVIX
20101204024336.556|20101204024337.667|CCO|  leaving you at greater risk
20101204024337.667|20101204024338.778|CCO|  for heart attack and stroke.
20101204024338.778|20101204024339.889|CCO|      Your doctor may use
20101204024339.889|20101204024341.000|CCO|         genetic tests
20101204024341.000|20101204024342.250|CCO|    to determine treatment.
20101204024342.250|20101204024343.500|CCO|    Don't stop taking PLAVIX
20101204024343.500|20101204024344.750|CCO| without talking to your doctor
20101204024344.750|20101204024346.000|CCO|  as your risk of heart attack
20101204024346.000|20101204024347.250|CCO|    or stroke may increase.
20101204024347.250|20101204024348.500|CCO| People with stomach ulcers or
20101204024348.500|20101204024349.750|CCO| conditions that cause bleeding
20101204024349.750|20101204024351.000|CCO|     should not use PLAVIX.
20101204024351.000|20101204024352.000|CCO|      Taking PLAVIX alone

20101204024353.000|20101204024354.000|CCO|       including aspirin,
20101204024354.000|20101204024355.000|CCO|  may increase bleeding risk,
20101204024355.000|20101204024356.000|CCO|      so tell your doctor
20101204024356.000|20101204024357.000|CCO|     when planning surgery.
20101204024357.000|20101204024358.000|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101204024358.000|20101204024359.000|CCO|    all medicines you take,
20101204024359.000|20101204024400.000|CCO| including aspirin, especially
20101204024400.000|20101204024401.000|CCO|    if you've had a stroke.
20101204024401.000|20101204024402.667|CCO| If fever, unexplained weakness
20101204024402.667|20101204024404.333|CCO|     or confusion develops,
